Text:
"A Fistful of Dollars" - made in 1964 is Sergio Leone's first film in a trilogy about The Man With No Name. It is widely considered to be one of the finest "Spaghetti Westerns" ever made.

And when one considers it is a re-make of Akira Kurosawa's masterpiece "Yojimbo" starring Clint Eastwood there should be little doubt as to why "Fistful" has earned such a reputation! Simply awesome!

All the AsianTorrents people should check this one out too, quite an interesting take on Kurosawa to be sure.
Thanks for the Upload, I'm going for the trilogy!
